knimeNode.name: RDKit Add Conformers
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a new table with multiple conformers per input molecule. Each conformer is a copy of the molecule with different coordinates assigned. * nEach conformer row is mapped back to the input table molecule with an identifier - usually the row id - taken from an input table column.
